settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.text: Find answers to common questions about orders, shipping, and more.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-7 business days within the US. International orders typically arrive in 7-14 business days.

settings.question: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $100. Express shipping is available at an additional cost.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also check your order status in your account.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and with original tags attached.

settings.question: How do I start a return?
settings.answer: Log into your account and navigate to your order history. Select the order and click 'Start Return' to print your prepaid label.

settings.question: When will I receive my refund?
settings.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return. It may take an additional 3-5 days to appear on your statement.

settings.question: How do I find my size?
settings.answer: Check our size guide on each product page. We recommend measuring yourself and comparing to our size chart for the best fit.

settings.question: Are your products authentic?
settings.answer: Absolutely. We only sell 100% authentic products. Every item goes through a verification process before shipping.

settings.title: Still Have Questions?
settings.text: Our support team is here to help. Reach out anytime.
